maml:description.maml:para: Sends a DICOM C-Echo to a DICOM endpoint.
Sends a DICOM C-Echo to a DICOM endpoint. Reteurn the response, and time taken to respond (If successfull).
The port number of the remote DICOM interface.
The local (calling) AE Title
The remote (called) AE Title
Negiotiate a TLS secured connection (the remote DICOM interface must support TLS secured connections).
The timeout in seconds to wait for DICOM association, or a response from the DICOM service once a request has been submitted.
The port number of the remote DICOM interface.
The local (calling) AE Title
The remote (called) AE Title
Negiotiate a TLS secured connection (the remote DICOM interface must support TLS secured connections).
The timeout in seconds to wait for DICOM association, or a response from the DICOM service once a request has been submitted.

command:example.maml:title: Example 1
command:example.dev:code:
C:\PS> Send-CEcho -HostName www.dicomserver.co.uk -Port 11112
Hostname Port ResponseTime Status -------- ---- ------------ ------ www.dicomserver.co.uk 11112 1587 ms Success

maml:description.maml:para: Send a C-FIND query to a DICOM interface, display the results returned.
Send a C-FIND query to a DICOM interface, display the results returned. Default values for LocalAETitle and RemoteAETitle used if not supplied via the parameters.

Search by values provided in either PatientName, PatientID, StudyID, or AccessionNumber parameters. Include * search string for wildcard searches. Warning: A single search value of * will return all studies.
The port number of the remote DICOM interface.
The local (calling) AE Title
The remote (called) AE Title
The name of the patient to search for. Can include '*' for wildcard searches.
Constrain the search to a modality type.
Constrain the search for studies acquired on or after this date. Accepts any string that can be parsed as a date.
Constrain the search for studies acquired on or before this date. Accepts any string that can be parsed as a date.
Negiotiate a TLS secured connection (the remote DICOM interface must support TLS secured connections).
The timeout in seconds to wait for DICOM association, or a response from the DICOM service once a request has been submitted.
The port number of the remote DICOM interface.
The local (calling) AE Title
The remote (called) AE Title
The patient ID to search for. Can include '*' for wildcard searches.
Constrain the search to a modality type.
Constrain the search for studies acquired on or after this date. Accepts any string that can be parsed as a date.
Constrain the search for studies acquired on or before this date. Accepts any string that can be parsed as a date.
Negiotiate a TLS secured connection (the remote DICOM interface must support TLS secured connections).
The timeout in seconds to wait for DICOM association, or a response from the DICOM service once a request has been submitted.
The port number of the remote DICOM interface.
The local (calling) AE Title
The remote (called) AE Title
The study instance ID to search for. Can include '*' for wildcard searches.
Constrain the search to a modality type.
Constrain the search for studies acquired on or after this date. Accepts any string that can be parsed as a date.
Constrain the search for studies acquired on or before this date. Accepts any string that can be parsed as a date.
Negiotiate a TLS secured connection (the remote DICOM interface must support TLS secured connections).
The timeout in seconds to wait for DICOM association, or a response from the DICOM service once a request has been submitted.
The port number of the remote DICOM interface.
The local (calling) AE Title
The remote (called) AE Title
The Accession number to search for. Can include '*' for wildcard searches.
Constrain the search to a modality type.
Constrain the search for studies acquired on or after this date. Accepts any string that can be parsed as a date.
Constrain the search for studies acquired on or before this date. Accepts any string that can be parsed as a date.
Negiotiate a TLS secured connection (the remote DICOM interface must support TLS secured connections).
The timeout in seconds to wait for DICOM association, or a response from the DICOM service once a request has been submitted.
The port number of the remote DICOM interface.
The local (calling) AE Title
The remote (called) AE Title
Negiotiate a TLS secured connection (the remote DICOM interface must support TLS secured connections).
The timeout in seconds to wait for DICOM association, or a response from the DICOM service once a request has been submitted.
The name of the patient to search for. Can include '*' for wildcard searches.
The patient ID to search for. Can include '*' for wildcard searches.
The study instance ID to search for. Can include '*' for wildcard searches.
The Accession number to search for. Can include '*' for wildcard searches.
Constrain the search to a modality type.

Constrain the search for studies acquired on or before this date. Accepts any string that can be parsed as a date.

dev:remarks.maml:para: Find all patients where Patient Name is 'Test'
Find all patients with Patient ID starting with '123'
Find all CT scans acquired from 1 Jan 2020 through to 31 Dec 2020
Find patient details for Study Instance ID of '1.2.826.0.1.3680043.2.891.113.20210702141058064482710'

maml:description.maml:para: Displays the DICOM tags from a DICOM file.
Displays the DICOM tags from a DICOM file.
The path of the DICOM file(s). Can include wildcards or regular expressions to specify multiple files.
The literal path to a DICOM file.
The path of the DICOM file(s). Can include wildcards or regular expressions to specify multiple files.
The literal path to a DICOM file.
